summary: Feature request for out-of-the-box Sentry integration to simplify error logging in TypeScript SDK activities. Currently requires implementing a custom ActivityInboundCallsInterceptor.
userImpact: Users must implement custom ActivityInboundCallsInterceptor to integrate Sentry, reducing ease of error tracking setup.
proposedFix: Implement a Sentry integration module within the SDK that simplifies error logging to Sentry.
workaround: Users can implement a custom ActivityInboundCallsInterceptor or register a custom logger to achieve Sentry integration.
resolutionDetails: Team decided not to provide out-of-the-box Sentry support, as users can easily implement this themselves using custom logger registration.
keyQuote: We have no plan to add out-of-the-box support for Sentry in the foreseeable future, and users can easily do that themselves by registering a custom logger.
